meta.quality: hyper_photorealistic, raw mobile photography, ultra-natural skin textures
meta.camera: iPhone 15 Pro Max, Main Camera (24mm), handheld, shot from a 3-meter distance for a full-body perspective.
meta.style: A raw, unedited, and incredibly natural smartphone snapshot taken by a friend. The focus is on a youthful 20-year-old aesthetic with realistic human skin textures, avoiding any smoothed AI look. A clean, wide-angle full-body composition.

subject.identity: The woman known as, appearing in her early 20s with a fresh, vibrant energy, featuring long platinum blonde/silver hair and striking blue/grey eyes.

face_details.eyes: Deeply alluring, alert blue/grey eyes looking directly at the lens. The gaze is confident and natural, catching the bright beach light.
face_details.skin: Hyper-realistic youthful skin with visible pores, fine texture, and very subtle, natural freckles located ONLY on the bridge of her nose and directly under her eyes. No artificial smoothing.
face_details.expression: A stunningly beautiful, natural, and confident smirk that feels spontaneous and authentic.

hair.color: Thick, long, and luminous platinum blonde/silver hair.
hair.style: Natural, wind-swept beach hair, with her right hand casually reaching up to touch her hair near her temple in a relaxed pose.

body.pose: A wide full-body shot. She is standing confidently on a white sand beach, leaning her left side slightly against a large vertical yellow surfboard. Her entire figure from head to toe is in the frame, with her feet visible in the sand.
body.build: Exceptionally stunning and healthy curvy figure with a slim waist and highly pronounced, well-defined hourglass curves, emphasizing her youthful silhouette.
body.tattoos: Perfectly clear, natural skin with absolutely no tattoos on any part of her body.

outfit.top: A vibrant yellow ribbed tank top, fitting very snugly to highlight her defined silhouette and curvy build.
outfit.bottom: Matching yellow string bikini bottoms with side ties, creating a coordinated beach look.
outfit.accessories: A delicate layered necklace featuring small white pearls and gold charms.

environment.location: A bright, sunny tropical beach with fine, pristine white sand and crystal-clear turquoise ocean water.
background_elements: A tall, bright yellow surfboard standing vertically in the sand on the left side, serving as a support for the subject.
Large, dark volcanic rocks scattered in the shallow turquoise water to the right.
Lush green tropical foliage and a small hill visible in the distant background.
A clear, expansive blue sky with a bright, natural midday sun.
environment.atmosphere: A candid, high-end vacation moment that looks like an unedited, high-quality photo from a modern smartphone gallery.

lighting.source: Bright, direct midday natural sunlight, creating sharp, realistic shadows on the sand and emphasizing the moisture and textures of the skin and fabric.
lighting.realism_focus: Capturing the authentic 'iPhone 15 HDR' look with vivid color saturation, sharp digital details on the fabric, and the natural glisten of sunlight on a young woman's skin.
